name: Axe

nlight.desc: A single sideways slice in front from a standing position. Hitting results in a second followup cut, which knocks targets up and back.

slight.desc: A short overhead chop in front. Has a short lunge that carries the Legend forward a short distance. Carries little force.

dlight.desc: A quick cut in a high upwards diagonal in front, hitting above and in front of the player.

nair.desc: A single arcing chop above the Legend's head. Has a broad sweep, but not very tall, with a quick execution.

sair.desc: A heavy hitting, sideways swiping attack in a narrow but long arc in front. Has a slight delay, but carries a lot of force and range.

dair.desc: An arcing chop directly underneath the Legend. Has a broad sweep, but short length, very similar to the Neutral Air.

recovery.desc: A leaping lunge forward and up into the air, followed by a 360 degree spin with the axe that hits everything around the Legend. Delivers a single, powerful strike to anything struck.

gp.desc: A double 360 degree downwards spin with the axe that hits everything around the Legend. Delivers several small hits to anything struck. Lasts a set time, but can be held before being executed. If the Legend hits the ground before the attack completes, the axe comes to a stop in front of the Legend.
